page.title: 09MULTI-CULTURAL BROCKWORTH
page.content: The local {Anglican} church has a regular worshipping congregation of about 250 adults and 200 children.We carried out a survey of church attendance and found that 15% of our pupils(11-18) attended church;only 3% attend weekly.Twice as many mothers (12%) attended church as fathers;twice as many sisters (8%) as brothers. A {Sikh} female comments on her move from multi-racial Wolverhampton to here -"I experienced racism before but this was nothing to what I was to find.The mind- less minority made my life a miseery. After only 2 months the underlying current of racism came to a head.I was beaten up by 5 mindless racist thugs. This was not an isolated incident and I suffered 2 years of verbal attacks before I could persuade the police to do anything".
